Generate a summary of these two articles about the use of renewable energy. Article 1: Renewable energy is an increasingly important part of our electricity mixture. It is a clean, reliable, and sustainable source of electricity that does not pollute the air or deplete the environment. Renewable energy also helps to reduce greenhouse gas emissions which are a major cause of climate change. 

Article 2: Renewable energy is becoming more and more popular around the world. This is because of its many advantages such as being affordable, renewable, and sustainable. It also helps to reduce the amount of pollution that is released into the atmosphere. In addition, renewable energy can help to create local jobs and promote economic growth.
